item.title: BBS - Bulletin Board Systems
item.description: /c/BBS - Bulletin Board Systems on lemmy.uncomfortable.business [home] [/c/bbs ðŸŒŽ] [lemmy.uncomfortable.business] Description For discussion of 70s/80s/90s BBS systems, and their modern equivalents. Questions about BBSes and their software, door games, ANSI art, and so on are welcome as are sysop advertisements. Looking for a BBS to connect to? [The Telnet BBS Guide](https://www.telnetbbsguide.com/) is what you're after. Need a client? [Syncterm](https://syncterm.bbsdev.net/) is available for almost every platform.
